verses.roman:
vaibhava-gaṇa yena tāṅra aṅga-vibhūti
bimba-pratibimba-rūpa mahiṣīra tati

synonyms: vaibhava-gaṇa—the expansions; yena—as it were; tāṅra—of Her; aṅga—of the body; vibhūti—powerful expansions; bimba—reflections; pratibimba—counterreflections; rūpa—having the form; mahiṣīra—of the queens; tati—the expansion.
translation: The goddesses of fortune are partial manifestations of Śrīmatī Rādhikā, and the queens are reflections of Her image.
